channel.title: How do I use WireShark for my RSPS
channel.description: hey, I got wireshark and was wondering how I could configure it to show the packets being sent and received between my client and server.

item.title: How do I use WireShark for my RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

sinisoul:

Well you have to filter out the packets sent to the server which obviously have a destination port of 43595 or [YOUR_PORT_HERE] and are use the TCP transport layer. Go from there.

Got it thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I use WireShark for my RSPS
